businessProfile.name: The Hub Pizza Co.
businessProfile.address: 2002 N Main St #5, Cedar City, UT 84721, USA
businessProfile.formatted_address: 2002 N Main St #5, Cedar City, UT 84721, USA

reviews.text: This place was a fun mini-New York. The workers were so helpful. The person that took our order was so patient while we decided what to get. We ended up getting the Friday special (build your own: Alfredo, spinach, chicken, mushrooms, and red onion). The worker was so nice to let me video the dough toss.  We eat pizza the night before every race. This was race #9 for us, and we both agree that this was the best pizza so far.

Probably the best pizza I‚Äôve ever had in my life! I got the Jalapeno popper pizza with added sausage and mushrooms. It had so much flavor and was absolutely delicious. I ordered on the toast app and it was ready within 30 minutes. The service was super friendly while picking up the food. I will definitely be back! My original review was 5 stars but after reviewing my order, I ordered green olives which were not there, and I paid extra for,  and square cut which it was triangle cut to 10 pieces.

This pizza location is the best in Southern Utah! It‚Äôs one of our favorites places to go with family and friends to enjoy some delicious pizza. Jancey‚Äôs jalape√±o popper pizza will change your world! The best is the cheesy cow pie - it‚Äôs worth every bite especially when it‚Äôs not cut! Thank you for serving our community!

Great pizza, love the high quality, fresh toppings, delicious light and crispy crust with extra Parmesan on it. Toys to play with for kids while we waited, and very professional staff. We love going to The Hub! It‚Äôs a treat!

I work out on HWY 56 and most businesses won't deliver out here.  I thought my only choice was DD, but hen I called they were super kind and with a small delivery fee they were happy to deliver our order to us.  THANK YOU!  We ordered 4 different pizzas, and I'm just a huge fan of their sweet dough crust.  I love how huge their toppings are, and the sauce balanced out very well on each pie.  Will definitely be calling them again!!

recentReviews.text: Excellent service! I placed an order on the toast app and couldn't remember if I selected delivery,  I called and they were more than happy to help! It was for pick up and they changed it to delivery.
Hit the spot! We‚Äôll definitely be back soon!
They are consistent with the pizza taste and quality

This place was a fun mini-New York. The workers were so helpful. The person that took our order was so patient while we decided what to get. We ended up getting the Friday special (build your own: Alfredo, spinach, chicken, mushrooms, and red onion). The worker was so nice to let me video the dough toss.  We eat pizza the night before every race. This was race #9 for us, and we both agree that this was the best pizza so far.

I ain't going to any pizza joint located between a funeral home and a clinic!
Just imagine what could be in that chunk o pizza!
Some of the best pizza I‚Äôve had, SO delicious!! The side salad was so good too! Perfect balance with pizza! Joshua was great at answering all my questions about the menu! Highly recommend!

detailedReviews.author: Greg Espinosa
detailedReviews.text: Great place

detailedReviews.author: Mike Farr
detailedReviews.text: Excellent service! I placed an order on the toast app and couldn't remember if I selected delivery,  I called and they were more than happy to help! It was for pick up and they changed it to delivery.

detailedReviews.author: Ty Palmer
detailedReviews.text: Hit the spot! We‚Äôll definitely be back soon!

detailedReviews.author: Dora Ponnequin
detailedReviews.text: They are consistent with the pizza taste and quality

detailedReviews.author: Sarah CJ Pugh Fairchild
detailedReviews.text: This place was a fun mini-New York. The workers were so helpful. The person that took our order was so patient while we decided what to get. We ended up getting the Friday special (build your own: Alfredo, spinach, chicken, mushrooms, and red onion). The worker was so nice to let me video the dough toss.  We eat pizza the night before every race. This was race #9 for us, and we both agree that this was the best pizza so far.

detailedReviews.author: Zrd
detailedReviews.text:
I ain't going to any pizza joint located between a funeral home and a clinic!
Just imagine what could be in that chunk o pizza!

detailedReviews.author: Catania Holman
detailedReviews.text: Some of the best pizza I‚Äôve had, SO delicious!! The side salad was so good too! Perfect balance with pizza! Joshua was great at answering all my questions about the menu! Highly recommend!

detailedReviews.author: Raymond Souza
detailedReviews.text: First time very impressed. Definitely definitely I'll come back again even though it's a little bit of a drive. But I was told they're going to open up one in my location the original town

detailedReviews.author: Jessica
detailedReviews.text: Great pizza

detailedReviews.author: Monica McGlochlin
detailedReviews.text: Love the personal pan size so everyone can pick what they want  delicious dessert pizza, and amazing breadsticks

detailedReviews.author: Adam Wilcock
detailedReviews.text: We had The Hub deliver food for a new hire orientation event and it was fantastic! They even made sure we had plates, forks, tongs for the salad and serving spoons for the dessert (frostbites). Everyone loved the food and there was plenty to go around. I will definitely be doing it again in the future.

detailedReviews.author: Maria Ocejo
detailedReviews.text: Hands down theeeee best pizza I have had besides the one I enjoy back in my home town. But absolutely delicious pizza not gonna lie. Thanks again for the yummy Pizza Hit the spot.

detailedReviews.author: Mary McConnell Terranova
detailedReviews.text:
New to the area and chose this place for pizza and it was AWESOME!
Crust was soft & chewy and plenty of cheese - we got the pepperoni pizza and it was spot on!!

detailedReviews.author: James
detailedReviews.text: Best pizza in Cedar City! Friendly staff! Highly recommended!

detailedReviews.author: Jeff Hansen
detailedReviews.text: The cheesy cowpie is super good.

detailedReviews.author: Kevin Johnson
detailedReviews.text: My favorite pizza place in Cedar City. It's delicious and they have fantastic breadsticks as well. The service is always good. If I'm waiting for a pickup they never have let me have to wait to get to the front of the line. They come and ask me and have me my food earlier. Just a nice touch and a very good pizza place.

detailedReviews.author: TempWise Heating & Cooling
detailedReviews.text: Great pizza locally owned!!

detailedReviews.author: Kayla Ebner
detailedReviews.text: I love their gluten free pizza! It‚Äôs the closest to regular pizza I can have. The service is good. The atmosphere and seating are good. They are easy to get to. I love coming here!

detailedReviews.author: Jen Tanner
detailedReviews.text: Always great food and service here.

detailedReviews.author: The offgrid Travelers
detailedReviews.text:
Absolutely love this pizza. Hands down the best in Cedar City.
Truly a authentic Italian pizza, just like one I would eat back east growing up.
I make the drive every other week from Bryce Canyon just for my pizza fix.üòã

detailedReviews.author: Pat Cummings
detailedReviews.text:
Consistently great pizza, especially with their slice lunch special - and now with more booths! We loved the senior-friendly bench cushions that were along either the west or the east wall. Today we arrived just as the lunch rush left to find honest diner booths along BOTH the east and west walls. Could The Hub get do any more to be our favorite pizza place? I don't think so!

9 months back: Their pizza is marvelous, to start. The lunch special that runs until 4 pm lets you get 2-3 slices of it, mix-and-match. Or you can get the absolutely delicious "gluten free" pizza made with a cauliflower crust - that's my favorite, just for the flavor. Check out the 8 varieties of real ice cream, too.

detailedReviews.author: Ammon Demke
detailedReviews.text: Awesome pizza! Great service as everyone is super friendly

detailedReviews.author: Crista Bairett
detailedReviews.text: So good.

detailedReviews.author: joannie
detailedReviews.text: Enjoyed the pizza and ice cream. Service was excellent.

detailedReviews.author: Danielle Herrera
detailedReviews.text: I LOVE THE HUB PIZZA!  Yummmm!

detailedReviews.author: Johann Weller
detailedReviews.text: Love the pizza here, its always excellent!

detailedReviews.author: Regina Chandler
detailedReviews.text: I work out on HWY 56 and most businesses won't deliver out here.  I thought my only choice was DD, but hen I called they were super kind and with a small delivery fee they were happy to deliver our order to us.  THANK YOU!  We ordered 4 different pizzas, and I'm just a huge fan of their sweet dough crust.  I love how huge their toppings are, and the sauce balanced out very well on each pie.  Will definitely be calling them again!!

detailedReviews.author: j hill
detailedReviews.text: Best pizza in town!

detailedReviews.author: Matthew Crawley
detailedReviews.text: 1 hour wait for a pizza with 10% of the tables filled? Good luck.

detailedReviews.author: Scot Speck
detailedReviews.text: Great pizza

detailedReviews.author: Sonia Krohn
detailedReviews.text: This is a N.Y. pizza style that was only good. It is better for taking out instead of dining in.

detailedReviews.author: Maxcine Jensen
detailedReviews.text: Awesome pizza!

detailedReviews.author: Leslie Leader
detailedReviews.text: I love the hub. Pizza, pasta, salad, calzones and much more...it's all delicious

detailedReviews.author: lovable bunny
detailedReviews.text: I'd give more stars if I could decided to see what the prices where prices where outstanding food was phenomenal this will be our new favorite pizza place to come to when we visit Southern Utah

detailedReviews.author: Barbara Goodwin
detailedReviews.text: The Hub always delivers great food and amazing service.

detailedReviews.author: Barbara Rodriguez
detailedReviews.text: Had a last minute dinner get together and the bonus was I had just won a free large pizza in a contest sponsored by The Hub.  Drove over got the pizza ordered and added on an order of Frost Bites.  The food was GREAT, the Frost Bites heavenly, and it was all ready in no more than 15 minutes!  THANKS to The Hub and their friendly employees for making my evening very stress free.

detailedReviews.author: Mason Wilson
detailedReviews.text:
I have been making pizza since I was 12 years old, I ran a Domino's for 5 years. I've tried pizza from San Francisco to Chicago and many more.

In my subjective opinion this is the best pizza for the price that I've been able to find. It's dough is the perfect amount of soft and chewy. The sauce isn't too sweet, and the cheese isn't dripping with oil.

The atmosphere is amazing, just yesterday I walked in and the cashier was kind and patient. While I waited I was able to play the board games they have on hand.

Overall a very well run establishment!

detailedReviews.author: james stutte
detailedReviews.text: Just good pizza.üëç

detailedReviews.author: John Sage
detailedReviews.text: We are locals. This place is TERRIBLE. Strip mall dining at its worst. Unbelievably slow. Three kids working behind the counter and they were clearly more interested in talking rather than working. We ordered two small pizzas and a salad. Had to ask THREE times to get our salad. Been waiting so long for our pizzas we may get up and leave soon. We will NEVER come back here again. Don‚Äôt waste your time coming here. Go to Wood Side, or anywhere else. What a joke. They make you pay in advance and once they get the money, you don‚Äôt matter anymore. Nice‚Ä¶. OWNERS: Your crew on 7/12/2025 cost you customers and represented your restaurant very poorly. AWFUL!

detailedReviews.author: Jerni Talbot
detailedReviews.text: Wow the best pizza ever, The owner was so nice to my family(sisters) would give this more than 5 stars üåü ü§© ‚ú®Ô∏è

detailedReviews.author: Keli Andersen
detailedReviews.text: Great service!! The high noon was a great pizza, my mom had it on pasta. We were here from out of town and the service was great.

detailedReviews.author: Deborah garcia
detailedReviews.text:
I love this place!  They serve the best pizza in Cedar, hands-down!   And, the customer service is exceptional!   I will always support them.

UPDATE:  After 5 years of pizza here, we got one that was really bad!  I hope things are not changing with The Hub.  That would be really sad!    See attached pic of experience tonight.  It was NOT GOOD.   And I'm on the fence about going back.  So much grease... its nauseating!  We drive 20 min to get there, and I didnt check it because we've never had anything like this before.   When we got home, I was shocked!  So... IF I go back... that wont happen again!  It will be checked before we leave the store.

detailedReviews.author: Jori Kelly
detailedReviews.text: Love this place!

detailedReviews.author: Matthew Gledhill
detailedReviews.text: It's good, but just a little more expensive than I think it should be. I like the pizza. Payed like $16 for a large peperoni pizza. It fed 2 dudes, so it was decent sized. Most of the other pizzas were more expensive.

detailedReviews.author: Gary Taylor
detailedReviews.text: Great pizza!

detailedReviews.author: Mindful Canine
detailedReviews.text: A true community gem!! Not only was the pizza great but it was SUPER affordable and the customer service was excellent and memorable. This is an awesome option for a person like me who has a busy service route and doesn't want to break the bank for lunch. 100% recommend!

detailedReviews.author: Adora Ream
detailedReviews.text: Really good lunchtime is the best

detailedReviews.author: Genie Fife
detailedReviews.text:
Pizza and Garlic bread bites were delicious!!!
We unfortunately received our delivery an hour past the original estimated time and we did not receive the sauces we paid for. But the manager personally called us and apologized and provided a great service solution.
Great experience all around!

detailedReviews.author: Lee Wiley
detailedReviews.text: Amazing food! Great value! Fed our group of 25!

detailedReviews.author: Marisa Patch Sanderson
detailedReviews.text: Great pizza, love the high quality, fresh toppings, delicious light and crispy crust with extra Parmesan on it. Toys to play with for kids while we waited, and very professional staff. We love going to The Hub! It‚Äôs a treat!

detailedReviews.author: Darren Tyler (D-Train 2025)
detailedReviews.text: Since it was delivery to my home atmosphere was perfect.  Love the calzones. Top notch each time I have ordered from the hub.

detailedReviews.author: Hayley Rowley
detailedReviews.text: Love this place! It‚Äôs awesome :)

detailedReviews.author: Marlene Brackin
detailedReviews.text:
Food always great
Staff friendly & courtesy prompt food orders

detailedReviews.author: J D
detailedReviews.text: Pleasantly surprised in the taste of this place. 2- 12 inch pizzas for $37 is a big rich but it was quality. Hit it up when you‚Äôre in the area.

detailedReviews.author: Sonny Cheser
detailedReviews.text: We had pizza, baked pasta and a calzone, all were fantastic top off with a scoop of ice cream service was very nice and friendly will be going back fir sure

detailedReviews.author: Josh Foremaster
detailedReviews.text: Great pizza and cheesy bread!  We‚Äôll definitely order again.  Loved the original crust Margherita pizza.

detailedReviews.author: Aurora LeFevre
detailedReviews.text: The people here are always so nice and the food is really good. I haven't gotten a single salad with a single piece of lettuce out of place.

detailedReviews.author: Ginny McKay Mccomas
detailedReviews.text: The pizza is so tasty,  the crust is amazing!!!!

detailedReviews.author: Heidi Ream
detailedReviews.text: So good the best pizza ever it made everyone in the car happy I had to go back in and get some more it was so good

detailedReviews.author: Stephen
detailedReviews.text: Best pizza in Cedar City!

detailedReviews.author: eric c
detailedReviews.text: Good customer service and excellent pizza

detailedReviews.author: Richard Maloney
detailedReviews.text: Love Hub Pizza , best in town!!

detailedReviews.author: Elizabeth Ivie
detailedReviews.text: top notch on service and taste mmmmmgood

detailedReviews.author: S. C. Baxley
detailedReviews.text: Customer service was amazing!

detailedReviews.author: Jennifer Potter
detailedReviews.text: Always delicious and always willing to customize!

detailedReviews.author: Dawn Lloyd
detailedReviews.text: From SWFL. The sauce on the pizza was very flavorful. Good tasting pizza. Highly recommend

detailedReviews.author: Pamella Jacobson
detailedReviews.text: Heard about this place. Did not disappoint.  The pizza was wonderful and the canzone was great as well. The staff was very pleasant.

detailedReviews.author: Bonnie McPhie-Huggans
detailedReviews.text: We live the Hub pizza!

detailedReviews.author: Jen Jackson
detailedReviews.text: Best pizza in Cedar

detailedReviews.author: Alan Kunihiro
detailedReviews.text: The hub has great pizza at a great price!

detailedReviews.author: Thom Bluemel
detailedReviews.text: If you're looking for a great neighborhood pizza company with excellent pizza and a friendly, helpful, and couteous staff of wonderful local folks, you found a little piece of heaven at the Hub

detailedReviews.author: Kelsey Loflin
detailedReviews.text: If you're lucky enough to swing by, DO IT. The crust is to DIE FOR. (Even two days later.) We always order a cheese pizza on our first visit anywhere new, but we will absolutely be back for the famed jalapeno popper pizza. (We actually had the pleasure of chatting with the woman who created it ... and obviously, she was awesome, too). 10/10. Go get pizza now!

detailedReviews.author: Janice Harris
detailedReviews.text: I try to go to the Hub a couple of Tuesdays a month.  That is when pizza is 179 a slice. It‚Äôs as big or possibly bigger than a Costco slice of pizza and 10 times better! Today I was able to redeem my free large cheese pizza for picking one of the numbers in the lotto. I had them put peppers, onions and olives on half that cheese pizza and they only charge me $1.50 it‚Äôs a good bargain and it‚Äôs a good bite. And the workers there are cheerful and kind and nice!

detailedReviews.author: Tiffani Baker
detailedReviews.text: AMAZING!!! This pizza is sooooooooo fresh! Good portions and prices!!

detailedReviews.author: Billy Fielder
detailedReviews.text: Build your own! Delicious as always!

detailedReviews.author: Olivia Williams
detailedReviews.text: This pizza location is the best in Southern Utah! It‚Äôs one of our favorites places to go with family and friends to enjoy some delicious pizza. Jancey‚Äôs jalape√±o popper pizza will change your world! The best is the cheesy cow pie - it‚Äôs worth every bite especially when it‚Äôs not cut! Thank you for serving our community!

detailedReviews.author: Trevor Williams
detailedReviews.text: The Hub is not only some of the best pizza in Cedar City, it is one of the best in Southern Utah! And the staff is so awesome. Not many places still do pizza by the slice, and this place still does. I highly recommend! And the prices are great for what you get, great quality food!

customerMoodAnalysis.sentimentSummary: Customers are genuinely thrilled with their experience. With an average 4.8/5 rating across 100 recent reviews, your restaurant consistently exceeds expectations.

strengthsPerceived: Customers consistently praise the delicious taste and quality of the pizza, often mentioning it as the best they've had in the area. - social media marketing can showcase this strength
The staff is frequently highlighted for their friendliness, patience, and exceptional service, enhancing the overall dining experience. - review management can highlight this positive aspect
The restaurant's ability to accommodate special requests, such as changing orders from pickup to delivery, is highly appreciated by customers. - Boostly marketing services can amplify this
improvementOpportunities: Long wait times and slow service - Boostly marketing services can improve this
Negative reviews and reputation issues - review management can address this concern
Lack of atmosphere/ambiance awareness - social media marketing can improve this area
